name: Piscirazzi (benFlavell)
description:
WASD to move or hold Left Mouse Button to move

Space or Left Mouse Button to take a photo

Escape to pause

Try and take the best photo you can in the time limit!

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Recreated by Ben Flavell in 72 hours for The 2.0 Jam: https://itch.io/jam/the-version-two-jam

Piscirazzi Classic made in 2017: https://rebtf.itch.io/piscirazzi-classic

Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com
